name: Channel Header options and post menu options disappear seamlessly when the app become unreachable

inline.description: 1. Open any channel and ensure the channel header and post menu options are visible.
inline.expectedResult: Channel header options are displayed and can be selected

inline.description:
Disable the Cloud App or render it unreachable.
- Locate the terminal where the app is running and type command+C

customFields.Important notes about this step: This could be done by disabling an ngrok tunnel for example

inline.description:
1. Change the channel and open the channel header and post menu
2. Long press a post
3. Open the channel header
4. in the input box type `/test`
inline.expectedResult: Options added by the test-app are removed and remaining options are selectable.
